meanings.definition: The condition of being unpaired or solitary.
meanings.sent1: In the forest, the azygosis of the lone wolf made it stand out from the pack.
meanings.sent2: The azygosis of the unique flower caught the gardener's eye.
meanings.sent3: The azygosis of the only cookie left in the jar tempted the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: Her azygosis in the group project made her the standout star.
meanings.sent5: The azygosis of the single star in the sky shone brightly.

meanings.definition: The state of lacking a counterpart or match.
meanings.sent1: The puzzle piece's azygosis left it unmatched with the others.
meanings.sent2: The azygosis of the missing sock puzzled the laundry-doer.
meanings.sent3: The azygosis of the odd sock made it the talk of the drawer.
meanings.sent4: His azygosis in the debate team made him a force to be reckoned with.
meanings.sent5: The azygosis of the unique key made it impossible to duplicate.
